pr_title: Add session property to disable warnings, or treat warnings as errors

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, here you want to wrap the warning in the PrestoException so you will get better context.
timeline.author: kaikalur

replies.bodyText: In this case, after speaking with @kaikalur, we agreed that as of now, stack traces are not useful, but we may add the stack trace context in the future for future warnings.
replies.author: prithvip

timeline.message: Add session property to disable warnings, or treat warnings as errors

timeline.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: Should you check whether there are warnings before throwing exception?
replies.author: rongrong

replies.bodyText: Yes I should be checking. I will fix that. Whats the issue with the static import?
replies.author: prithvip

replies.bodyText: It's just convention. We always do static import unless the function name / constant by itself is too confusing.
replies.author: rongrong

timeline.bodyText: I'll probably only keep the WarningHandlingLevel as member variable rather than the whole session.
timeline.author: rongrong
